title: Ditching RYZEN .... Going Back To INTEL!
description: Dmitry's Ryzen productivity system has started to have some performance issues so he decided to give Intel's Coffee Lake a try and run some benchmarks to see if it improves efficiency.  Was it beneficial?  The answer to that is a bit complicated....   Subscribe to our (very) NEW CHANNEL - Boot Sequence:    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  i5-8600K:   ASUS Z370-A:   NZXT N7:   Thermaltake Riing Fans:   CM H500P Mesh:   Kraken X62 AIO:   G.Skill Trident Z RGB:    Subscribe    Review units provided free of charge by the companies mentioned in video. This video is sponsored by Thermaltake. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from any manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (buy from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #intelcoffeelake #amdryzen #hardwarecanucks
